text: Richard Gordon Kleindienst /kline-DEENST/ (August 5, 1923 â€“ February 3, 2000) was an American lawyer and politician. He was the United States Attorney General during the Watergate political scandal between 1972 to 1973. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Lawyers from Arizona Category:United States Attorneys General Category:Politicians from Arizona Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:United States Deputy Attorneys General
